content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Change control is a complex, multi-step process that requires collaboration across various teams within an organization.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each year, biopharma companies evaluate hundreds of changes to approved products, many of which have a regulatory impact. Attempting to manage these touchpoints through manual processes can lead to incomplete information, massive distribution delays, and issues with regulatory compliance.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Watch this webinar to hear how Veeva is streamlining change control and variation management for greater transparency and improved decision making.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By attending you will: - Learn the value of unifying disconnected business processes - See how streamlining change control improves decision making and lowers risks\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please follow the link below and watch the external video on YouTube.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GLti-Sxghh8\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Link to the module\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". You can also sign up to watch the webinar on the source site \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://go.veeva.com/changecontrol_2020\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The free accessible information can be found with the Veeva Systems Inc YouTube channel \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIytF59UAVv-FRrw8ZDFiiw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
